subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Mountaineers have a smothering defense and a fearless style of play that they will bring to their matchup on Thursday with the No. 1-seeded Wildcats.
snippet: The Mountaineers have a smothering defense and a fearless style of play that they will bring to their matchup on Thursday with the No. 1-seeded Wildcats.
